DOC.HEADLINE: COMMUNITY NEWS : MID-CITY : COUNTRY_CLUB PARK ; MEETING TO FOCUS_ON LURING FILMMAKERS
DOC.TEXT: The Country_Club Park Neighborhood Assn. ' s June meeting on Monday will feature a presentation by the California Film Commission titled " How to Attract Motion_Picture Filming to Our Community. " The meeting begins at 7 p.m. at the Pico-Arlington Christian_Church , 3405 W . Pico Blvd . Information : ( 213 ) 893-7039 .
